title: Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", ca. 1780
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, graphite on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Teapot with lion’s feet; bowl in shape of ship with dragon head as spout on left and putto playing harp as handle. Crown-like elements circulating top with flowers with long stems as finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, graphite on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4382.
